attributes.action: Bar those who have deliberately misled the public from leading political parties
attributes.background: Politics in the UK is in a sad state.  Many politicians have lied or been reckless about the truth. This has contributed to detached from politics.   For people to reconnect, we need greater integrity from politicians.  We can start by ensuring liars are barred from leading our political parties.

rejection.details:
Decisions on the leadership of political parties is a matter for the parties themselves and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might want to sign this petition on making it a criminal offence for MPs to deliberately mislead the general public:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/239850
